headline: Judge Says Baby Can Be Taken Off Life Support
abstract: The case, involving an 11-month-old girl born with a heart defect, has become a rallying point for conservatives. The child’s mother plans to appeal.
lead_paragraph: A Texas judge ruled on Thursday that a hospital’s plan to remove an 11-month-old girl from life support over her family’s objections could proceed, the latest twist in a case that has drawn notice from conservatives around the state.
keywords: Cook Children's Medical Center (Fort Worth, Tex)
